name: LiquidityPoolManager
description: Contract to distribute PARTY tokens to whitelisted trading pairs. After deploying, whitelist the desired pairs and set the avaxPartyPair. When initial administration is complete. Ownership should be transferred to the Timelock governance contract.

eventDecorators.name: OwnershipTransferred
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the contract is unpaused.

functionDecorators.name: activateFeeSplit
functionDecorators.description: Activates the fee split mechanism. Divides rewards between AVAX and PARTY pools regardless of liquidity. AVAX and PARTY pools will receive a fixed proportion of the pool rewards. The AVAX and PARTY splits should correspond to percentage of rewards received for each and must add up to 100. For the purposes of fee splitting, the AVAX/PARTY pool is a PARTY pool. This method can also be used to change the split ratio after fee splitting has been activated. Args: avaxSplit: Percent of rewards to distribute to AVAX pools partySplit: Percent of rewards to distribute to PARTY pools stableTokenSplit: Percent of rewards to distribute to STABLETOKEN pools.

functionDecorators.name: addWhitelistedPool
functionDecorators.description: Adds a new whitelisted liquidity pool pair. Generates a staking contract. Liquidity providers may stake this liquidity provider reward token and claim PARTY rewards proportional to their stake. Pair must contain either AVAX or PARTY. Associates a weight with the pair. Rewards are distributed to the pair proportionally based on its share of the total weight. Args: pair: pair to whitelist weight: how heavily to distribute rewards to this pool relative to other pools.

functionDecorators.name: calculateAndDistribute
functionDecorators.description: Calculate pool token distribution and distribute tokens. Methods are separate to use risk of approaching the gas limit. There must be vested tokens to distribute, so this method should be called after vestAllocation.

functionDecorators.name: calculateReturns
functionDecorators.description: Determine how the vested PARTY allocation will be distributed to the liquidity pool staking contracts. Must be called before distributeTokens(). Tokens are distributed to pools based on relative liquidity proportional to total liquidity. Should be called after vestAllocation()/.

functionDecorators.name: changeWeight
functionDecorators.description: Adjust the weight of an existing pool Args: pair: pool to adjust weight of weight: new weight.

functionDecorators.name: deactivateFeeSplit
functionDecorators.description: Deactivates fee splitting.

functionDecorators.name: distributeTokens
functionDecorators.description: After token distributions have been calculated, actually distribute the vested PARTY allocation to the staking pools. Must be called after calculateReturns().

functionDecorators.name: distributeTokensSinglePool
functionDecorators.description: Fallback for distributeTokens in case of gas overflow. Distributes PARTY tokens to a single pool. distibuteTokens() must still be called once to reset the contract state before calling vestAllocation. Args: pairIndex: index of pair to distribute tokens to, AVAX pairs come first in the ordering.

functionDecorators.name: getAvaxLiquidity
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the amount of liquidity in the pair. For an AVAX pool, the liquidity in the pair is two times the amount of AVAX. Only works for AVAX pairs. Args: pair: AVAX pair to get liquidity in Returns: the amount of liquidity in the pool in units of AVAX.

functionDecorators.name: getAvaxPartyRatio
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the price of swapping AVAX for 1 PARTY Returns: the price of swapping AVAX for 1 PARTY.

functionDecorators.name: getPartyLiquidity
functionDecorators.description: Calculates the amount of liquidity in the pair. For a PARTY pool, the liquidity in the pair is two times the amount of PARTY multiplied by the price of AVAX per PARTY. Only works for PARTY pairs. Args: pair: PARTY pair to get liquidity in conversionFactor: the price of AVAX to PARTY Returns: the amount of liquidity in the pool in units of AVAX.

functionDecorators.name: isAvaxPair
functionDecorators.description: Check if the given pair is a whitelisted AVAX pair. The AVAX/PARTY pair is considered an AVAX pair. Args: pair: pair to check Return: True if whitelisted and pair contains AVAX.

functionDecorators.name: isPartyPair
functionDecorators.description: Check if the given pair is a whitelisted PARTY pair. The AVAX/PARTY pair is not considered a PARTY pair. Args: pair: pair to check Return: True if whitelisted and pair contains PARTY but is not AVAX/PARTY pair.

functionDecorators.name: isStableTokenPair
functionDecorators.description: Check if the given pair is a whitelisted STABLE TOKEN pair. The AVAX/STABLETOKEN pair is not considered a STABLETOKEN pair. Args: pair: pair to check Return: True if whitelisted and pair contains PARTY but is not AVAX/PARTY pair.

functionDecorators.name: isWhitelisted
functionDecorators.description: Check if the given pair is a whitelisted pair Args: pair: pair to check if whitelisted Return: True if whitelisted.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: removeWhitelistedPool
functionDecorators.description: Delists a whitelisted pool. Liquidity providers will not receiving future rewards. Already vested funds can still be claimed. Re-whitelisting a delisted pool will deploy a new staking contract. Args: pair: pair to remove from whitelist.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: setavaxPartyPair
functionDecorators.description: Sets the AVAX/PARTY pair. Pair's tokens must be AVAX and PARTY. Args: pair: AVAX/PARTY pair.

functionDecorators.name: setavaxStableTokenPair
functionDecorators.description: Sets the AVAX/STABLETOKEN pair. Pair's tokens must be AVAX and STABLETOKEN. Args: pair: AVAX/STABLETOKEN pair.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: vestAllocation
functionDecorators.description: Claim today's vested tokens for the manager to distribute. Moves tokens from the TreasuryVester to the LPM. Can only be called if all previously allocated tokens have been distributed. Call distributeTokens() if that is not the case. If any additional PARTY tokens have been transferred to this this contract, they will be marked as unallocated and prepared for distribution.
